pkgmetadata.longdescription: Draw Ordered Oxford Grids // Use standard genomics file format (BED) and a table of orthologs to illustrate pair-wise synteny conservation at the genome-wide scale. Significantly conserved linkage groups are identified as described in Simakov et al. (2020) doi:10.1038/s41559-020-1156-z and displayed on an Oxford Grid (Edwards (1991) doi:10.1111/j.1469-1809.1991.tb00394.x). The package provides a function that uses a network-based greedy algorithm to find communities (Clauset et al. (2004) doi:10.1103/PhysRevE.70.066111) and so automatically order the chromosomes on the plot to improve interpretability.
